column4: not so much.  I've tried to like this place.  I been there twice
column5: the 1st time there was a hair in my eggs and the hash browns were covered in greasy onions when I asked for grilled. Do they comp'd the meal and have me gift certificate for a future visit. I went today
column6: got one of their skillets and asked for NO onions. I get back to the office
column7: excited to have what I hope will be a yummy breakfast
column8: and it's full of onions. UGH!. I called they said
column9: "Sorry. Do you wanna bring it back?". I waited about 30 minutes for my food in the first place
column10: only for it to be wrong
column12: I won't ever be back. So disappointed.
